google chrome: If you don't find the download button, first click on the thumbnail of the video or photo you want to download.
If you can't find the video or photo you want, try scrolling the screen to find the target video or photo.
If there are multiple images on the page while browsing, it means the thumbnail of the desired photo or video hasn't been successfully clicked.
Focus on the image change rather than text: before clicking, the page displays many photos; after clicking, only the selected image is enlarged.
If the URL prefix changes, it means the site has switched. Return to the original site.
